title: Stolen Kisses
description: Who knew a single chapstick could lead two of the most different people together? Ella Perry and Seth Lee are two of the most incompatible people in the world. With their constant bickering and pranking, you might think that they're secretly in love but that's not the case with them.When Seth moves in with the Perry family for a while, he and River decide to prank Ella by stealing her chapstick collection. Now it's up to her to deal with Seth Lee to get her stuff back.But the last thing she expected was to fall in love with the guy.
author: Kerttu-Liis Kiili
